      • detectCollision

        public boolean detectCollision​(Sprite player,
                               Sprite knight)
        Uses the getPointAsString() method of the Sprites to get the String representation of the Sprites position. The using those values compares them to see if they equal each other or the position of other game.
        Parameters:
        player -
        knight -
        Returns:
        true or false value depending on whether the player has hit something.
